channel.title: CVE Feed for Marel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Marel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-9626|2024-08-05T17:11:02.498Z -- marel -- marel%20food%20processing%20systems%20pluto%20platform
item.description: Systems using the Marel Food Processing Systems Pluto platform do not restrict remote access. Marel has created an update for Pluto-based applications. This update will restrict remote access by implementing SSH authentication.
